overview: Haniyeh exchanges love with Ismail, and refuses Morsi, who wants to marry her. Morsi rapes Haniyeh and is forced to agree to marry him and live with him a miserable life. Haniyeh's father dies and demands a divorce from Morsi, but he refuses. Ismail knows the truth, clashes with Morsi and kills him. Ismail is sentenced to prison.
title: Aqwa Min Al-Ayam
